title: The "Scientific" names for common (and not so common) botlane duos! POST #1
body:
Now of course when your connecting to a ranked game, you want to #tweet about your game to all your pals on #twitter! But if you were to say something like #gravesanniebot all your friends would laugh at you! Isnt that right Mundo?  
{{champion:36}} : Uh? Mundo?
You heard it hear first people!
BUT  DONT WORRY ABOUT LOOKING LAME ON TWITTER!
Now with this handy dandy super exciting guide you can get tweeting with complete coolness in no time! Tell em mundo!
{{champion:36}} : MUNDO SELL COOL IDEA!
No no mundo, you dont undertand! This guide doesn't cost money, its completely free!
{{champion:36}} : Huh?
YES! FREE!
Just refer to the guide below and get your fingers ready to start TWEETING!


**YE OLDE OFFICIAL BOTLANE SCIENTIFIC NAMING GUIDE! **

{{champion:1}} + {{champion:104}} = #OGodTheyHitSix

{{champion:25}}  + {{champion:15}} = #WhatCC?

{{champion:12}}  + {{champion:67}}  = #GetKnockedBackFoo'

{{champion:40}}  + {{champion:15}} = #SoYouWannaTrade?

{{champion:89}}  + {{champion:104}} = #OhGodTheyHitSix2.0

{{champion:25}}  + {{champion:222}} = #HeardYouLikedMoving

{{champion:83}}  + {{champion:104}} = #We'llDigYouYourGrave

{{champion:44}}  + {{champion:67}} (maxing silver bolts) = #**True**lyOutrageous 

{{champion:40}}  + {{champion:18}} = #WeHaveLateGameRight?

{{champion:37}} + {{champion:119}}  = #HeardYouLikedTradingAutos

{{champion:44}} + {{champion:81}}  = ...

{{champion:53}}  + {{champion:412}} = #Pullapalooza

{{champion:267}} + {{champion:105}} Feat. {{champion:111}}   = #SomethingFishy 

{{champion:37}}  + {{champion:51}} = #LookingAtYouVayne 

{{champion:81}} + {{champion:43}} = #OhGodThePoke

{{champion:89}}  + {{champion:63}} Feat. {{champion:122}} = #SunfireCape

{{champion:1}}  + {{champion:15}} = #BearsRunFasterThanYouThink

{{champion:41}} + {{champion:21}}  = #YouAreAPirate

{{champion:17}}  + {{champion:29}}  = #TheUnseenLaneIsTheDeadliest

{{champion:9}}  + {{champion:23}}  = #TryndaFear


ADD YOUR OWN IF YOU ARE BRAVE ENOUGH :D

replies.body:
Wait why did no one mention this?
{{champion:81}} + {{champion:99}}  #OfficialLesbianCouple
{{champion:17}} + {{champion:53}}  #HookedOnShrooms
{{champion:51}} + {{champion:254}} #PoliceBrutality
{{champion:126}} +{{champion:78}} #HammerTime
{{champion:133}} +{{champion:34}} #PoultryOfDoom
{{champion:17}} +{{champion:31}}  #WhatAMonster-OhAndChogath

LOL I find it funny that the OP drifts away from his thread name at times and lists combos of non-bot lanes (without the ADC).

...less we are talking lane swaps... but only LCS does that of course.

What you talking about, I duo graves/yorick ranked 24/7 

You would make a grave mistake underestimating that combo

It could come back from the dead to bite you

> [{quoted}](name=MacbethAndCheese,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=O3QHwbzn,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-03-26T05:07:39.481+0000)
>
> What you talking about, I duo graves/yorick ranked 24/7 
> 
> You would make a grave mistake underestimating that combo
> 
> It could come back from the dead to bite you

Graves is an ADC?.......

I am talking about some of your combos has 2 champs that neither of which is an ADC... such as {{champion:53}} {{champion:412}} , which unless you are trolling (and thus its own "twitter.#) wouldn't make sense...
You obviously have never seen Thresh/Blitz bot. The cheese may be real, but it's still scary
Always liked the LCS commentators referring to {{champion:412}} {{champion:236}} as the Wifesteal lane.
